name: Golden Oudh
description: 50 Years Golden Oudh is the epitome of 50 years of excellence in perfumery. This majestic blend consists of the finest oud, extracted from the khasiana tree species over 50 years ago, and has now matured to beyond perfection.

name: Najm Gold
description: Najm Gold by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Amber Vanilla fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Najm Gold was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Carbonnel. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Vanilla and Coconut; base notes are Vanilla, Musk and Sandalwood.

name: Najm Noir
description: Najm Noir by Al Haramain Perfumes is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Najm Noir was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Carbonnel.

name: Hayati
description: Hayati by Al Haramain Perfumes is an Amber Floral fragrance for women and men. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Carbonnel. Top notes are Musk and Amber; the middle notes are Musk, Rose, and Sugar; base notes are Musk, Woody Notes and Agarwood (Oud).

name: Basma Noir
description: Al Haramain Basma Noir 20ml, comes with a great scent and the perfection of a well balanced perfume that will cater for all the needs of the user who wants more than what the ordinary user needs with life

name: Mukhallat Sheufi
description: Al Haramain Mukhallath Seufi 6ml, comes with a great scent and the perfection of a well balanced perfume that will cater for all the needs of the user who wants more than what the ordinary user needs with life

name: Royal Musk
description: Royal Musk by Al Haramain Perfumes is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Royal Musk was launched in 2021. Top notes are Bergamot, Pepper and Ylang-Ylang; middle notes are Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley and Orris; base notes are Musk and Beeswax.

name: Musk Maliki
description: The Musk Maliki is like a garden full of bloomed colourful flowers. As you enter the garden, an airy top note will sprinkle dews of freshness to you. The citrusy essence of Green apple and Violet balanced with Lemon creates the first impression impeccable.

name: Musk Collection
description: Haramain Musk Collection is one of your collectible fragrances. The notes in it dance with each other. A little citrusy lemon plays well with the timid white flowers in the top note. In the heart of the fragrance, spicy nutmeg creates an impression.

name: Euphoric Roots Spray
description: This is perfection in battle purely magical aroma that appeals to your inner passions; this is what the Haramain Portfolio Euphoric Roots represents. A fragrance that is an impressive aura of allure and a living tribute to class.

name: Golden Oudh Spray
description: AL HARAMAIN GOLDEN OUD SPRAY 100ml, comes with a great scent and the perfection of a well balanced perfume that will cater for all the needs of the user who wants more than what the ordinary user needs with life

name: Amber Oudh Gold
description: aramain Amber Oud Gold Edition 60ml Spray  comes with a great scent and the perfection of a well balanced perfume that will cater for all the needs of the user who wants more than what the ordinary user needs with life.
